attributes.action: Say NO to the EU constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to stop Gordon Brown signing our nations rights away in every sense. We are being pushed from pillar to post already, without a say!
 I feel that it is OUR right to have a referendum before things start to go terribly wrong in the United kingdom...OUR NATION!

Please back the SUN newspaper, in it's fight against this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
